summary: A girl with PTSD attempts to refresh her life at a new school, but soon finds it impossible when she's afflicted by not only bullying and bad memories, but also the supernatural.
cast: Haley Bennett|Jake Weber|Chace Crawford|Shannon Woodward|Shanna Collins|AnnaLynne McCord|Marin Hinkle|Nina Siemaszko|Josh Stewart|Jessica Lowndes|Randy Wayne|Jamie McShane|Ron Canada|Kevin Cooney|Ross Thomas|Charles Rahi Chun|John Newton|Pete Shilaimon|Lili Asvar|Jesse Lewis|Jacob Yakob
keywords: teenager|resurrection|18th birthday|looking at oneself in a mirror|supernatural horror
title: The Haunting of Molly Hartley
